name: (2-Nitrophenyl)acetonitrile
Reason: 2-Nitrophenyl is a functional group that can significantly increase the melting point due to the presence of a nitro group, which introduces a strong withdrawing group that can increase intermolecular interactions and rigidity. The nitro group can contribute around +20 to +30°C. Additionally, the phenyl group can also contribute to the melting point due to its ability to enhance π-π interactions and overall molecular rigidity. Each phenyl group may contribute around +30 to +50°C.
